title: DHS Cuddalore Recruitment 2025 -Apply Offline for 80 Staff Nurse, Lab Technician Posts
description: The District Health Society Cuddalore (DHS Cuddalore) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 80 Staff Nurses, Lab Technicians, Pharmacists, Health Inspectors, and Multipurpose Hospital Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their D. Pharm, GNM, B.Sc Nursing, 08th, 12th, and DMLT can apply for the DHS Cuddalore Recruitment 2025 . The interest...
